text: My 8 month old has had a fever of 102.5 for 6 hours and won't stop crying. She's pulling at her ear. Do I need to go to the ER right now or can this wait until morning? I'm so scared
3 year old son fell off the couch 2 hours ago, threw up once, now he's sleeping. I keep reading about brain bleeds and I'm terrified. Should I wake him up??? Please help
My baby is 6 weeks old and has been crying for 4 hours straight. Nothing works. I've tried everything. I'm losing my mind. Is something seriously wrong with her?
I know you're probably going to say go to the ER but I literally cannot afford it. My 5yo can't breathe well and is wheezing. Just tell me - can I wait until the clinic opens at 8am or not?
Red rash all over my 18 month old's body after amoxicillin. It's spreading. She seems fine otherwise but Google says this could be Stevens-Johnson syndrome and I'm freaking out
My 7 year old threw up 6 times tonight, can't keep water down. He's just laying there. When do I worry about dehydration? How long can kids go without fluids?
Stop giving me the 'call your doctor' answer. My 4yo has a 104 fever, it's 3am, I already gave Tylenol an hour ago. Do I take her to the ER YES OR NO
My 10 month old just had his shots this morning and now he has a fever of 101 and is super fussy. Is this normal vaccine reaction or should I be worried??
2 year old daughter won't put weight on her left leg since she woke up. No injury that I know of. She's screaming when I touch it. I'm so scared, what could this be?
My son is 5 and just had what I think was a seizure. His whole body was shaking for maybe 2 minutes. He's confused now. Calling 911 right? Or is this something else? I'm shaking
9 month old has had diarrhea for 3 days, now there's blood in it. She's still drinking but seems tired. Is bloody diarrhea always an emergency?
I'm a single mom with no car and no money. My 6yo can barely breathe, using his stomach muscles. But the ER will bankrupt me. Please just tell me if he'll be okay until morning
My 4 month old's soft spot is bulging and she won't stop screaming. My husband says I'm overreacting but I think something is really wrong. Should I trust my gut?
11 year old daughter keeps saying her chest hurts and she can't catch her breath. She has anxiety so I don't know if this is real or panic. How do I tell the difference??
Tiny red dots all over my 2 year old's body that don't fade when I press on them. I Googled petechiae and now I'm terrified it's meningitis. He's acting totally normal though
My baby is 3 weeks old and her fever is 100.6. I know newborn fevers are serious but do I really need to go to the ER at 2am? She's eating fine
8 year old hit his head at soccer, no loss of consciousness but now 5 hours later he has a headache and seems dizzy. Coach said he was fine but I'm not sure
Please don't give me a generic answer. My 6 month old's fever is 103.2, Tylenol isn't working, and she feels like she's on fire. TELL ME if I should go to the hospital
My 3yo had a breath-holding spell and turned blue for like 30 seconds. She's fine now but I'm traumatized. Is this dangerous? Will it happen again?
7 month old won't stop crying, pulling legs up to chest. Hasn't pooped in 2 days. Could this be that intussusception thing I read about? I'm so worried
My 5 year old keeps holding his neck stiff and crying when he tries to look down. He has a fever too. My mom mentioned meningitis and now I can't think straight
I don't care if you're not supposed to diagnose over the internet. My 18 month old is retracting with every breath. Is this an emergency or not? Give me a real answer
Baby is 8 weeks, hasn't had a wet diaper in 8 hours, keeps refusing the breast, fontanelle looks a bit sunken. Am I being paranoid or should I be worried?
My 4yo daughter suddenly can't walk, says her legs hurt, has a fever of 102. This started after she had a cold last week. Could this be that paralysis thing from viruses?
10 year old son complaining of the worst headache of his life, threw up twice, sensitive to light. I'm reading about brain aneurysms and I'm panicking
My 15 month old has been screaming and tugging at both ears for 2 hours. Fever of 101.8. It's Saturday night. Can ear infections wait until Monday or do I need urgent care?
Everyone keeps saying 'call your pediatrician' but it's 4AM. My 2yo has 105 fever even after meds. At what temperature do I just go to the ER? Give me a number
6 year old fell off monkey bars onto his arm 3 hours ago. He won't move it and it's starting to swell. But he's not crying anymore. Does it need to be seen tonight?
My 9 month old baby girl is making this weird barking cough sound. She seems okay otherwise but it's scaring me. Is this croup? What do I do?
3 year old has been vomiting every 30 minutes for 4 hours, getting weaker, lips look dry. I can't get him to drink anything. How do I know if he's dehydrated enough for the ER?
My daughter is 7 and having her second febrile seizure tonight. First one was 10 minutes ago, just had another one. Do I call 911 or just let them pass? I'm alone and terrified
Look I need a straight answer not a CYA response. 5yo stepped on a rusty nail, it went pretty deep. His last tetanus shot was at 4 years. Does he need another one or not?
My 11 month old just projectile vomited 3 times in a row. Like across the room. She seems okay now but I've never seen that before. Is projectile vomiting always serious?
8 year old daughter started sleepwalking and says she can't remember things from yesterday. She hit her head 3 days ago but seemed fine. Could this be delayed concussion symptoms?
My 2 year old's poop is black and tarry. He's been acting fine but I read this means internal bleeding. Am I overreacting? He did eat a ton of blueberries yesterday
4 month old baby has been crying for 6 hours straight. High pitched screaming. She won't eat, won't sleep. I've checked everything. Is this normal or is something wrong with her brain?
My pediatrician's office said to monitor but my 6yo's breathing is getting worse not better. Wheezing, using neck muscles. Do I listen to them or go to ER anyway? Feeling lost
Stop telling me to 'seek medical attention'. I'm ASKING if I need to. My 3yo has hives all over after peanut butter. No breathing issues. Is this going to get worse or can I just give Benadryl?
My 18 month old son woke up limping and crying. Right leg. No fever, no injury I know of. Could he have hurt it in the crib? Do I wait to see if it gets better?
7 year old with autism can't tell me what hurts. He's been holding his head and rocking for an hour, seems really distressed. How do I know if this is behavioral or medical?
My 5 month old's temp is 99.9 under the arm. Is that a fever? Do I need to worry? She seems totally fine but I'm a first time mom and I don't know what counts as a real fever
9 year old son passed out at school today during PE. Came to after a few seconds. School called me but he seems fine now. Do kids just faint sometimes or is this serious?
My 2yo daughter's vomit has red streaks in it. She's thrown up 5 times tonight. Is this blood? Do I need to go to the ER or am I panicking over nothing?
I'm not taking 'see a doctor' as an answer. It's 2am. My 8 month old has a rash that looks like bruises on her legs. Tell me if this can wait 6 hours or not
4 year old fell backwards and hit the back of his head on concrete. He cried immediately and there's a huge goose egg. He's acting normal now. Do I still need to worry about brain injury?
My 6 month old is breathing fast, like really fast. I counted 60 breaths per minute. She doesn't have a fever. Is this pneumonia? Should I go to the ER right now?
12 year old daughter keeps complaining of chest pain on the left side. She's healthy, no heart problems. But I'm terrified. Can kids have heart attacks? What else could this be?
My 3 year old just had his MMR shot 5 days ago and now has a fever and rash. The nurse said this might happen but the rash looks scary. Is this a normal vaccine reaction?
Don't give me liability disclaimer BS. My 7yo's fever has been 104+ for 3 days despite alternating Tylenol and Motrin. At what point is this not just a virus? When do I demand more tests?
10 month old baby crying inconsolably and pulling knees to chest. Having weird jelly-like red poops. I read about intussusception online. Am I being paranoid?
My 5 year old says his private area hurts and it looks red. I don't see any injury. Could this be a UTI? Do boys even get those? I feel like a bad mom for not knowing
8 year old daughter having weird jerking movements with her arms for the past hour. She's awake and alert. Is this a seizure? Can you have a seizure while awake? I'm so confused
My 16 month old face is all swollen, especially around the eyes. Started this morning. No known allergies. He seems fine otherwise but looks like a different kid. Is this dangerous?
I already know you'll say see a doctor. But WHEN? My 4yo has had a fever for 5 days, no other symptoms. Pediatrician said virus but I think they're missing something. Am I crazy?
6 week old baby grunting with every breath. Making these weird noises. She's been doing it for 2 hours. Is this normal newborn stuff or breathing problems?
My 9 year old son refuses to go to school, having meltdowns every morning. Today he threw up before school. Is this anxiety making him physically sick or coincidence?
3 year old daughter's vagina is bleeding a tiny bit. No trauma I know of. I'm freaking out. Is this a medical emergency? What could cause this? I'm too scared to Google
My 7 month old rolled off the bed onto hardwood floor. He screamed immediately but calmed down. Acting normal now but I feel like the worst parent ever. Do I need to get him checked?
Forget the 'I'm not a doctor' disclaimer. You know stuff. My 5yo lips are turning blue while sleeping. Should I wake her up? Take her to ER? She's still breathing
11 year old complaining of really bad stomach pain in the lower right side. It's getting worse. I'm worried about appendicitis. What are the signs I should definitely go to the ER?
My 14 month old hasn't smiled or made eye contact all day. She has a fever of 101. Is this just because she feels bad or could this be something neurological? I'm spiraling
4 year old son drank some bathroom cleaner. Just a sip but I'm panicking. He seems fine. Do I call poison control? Make him vomit? Rush to ER? What do I do RIGHT NOW?
My 2 year old's seizure lasted 4 minutes. He has a fever of 103. He's sleeping now. Everyone says febrile seizures are 'normal' but that was the scariest thing I've ever seen. Is he okay?
6 year old has had diarrhea 10+ times today, now saying she's dizzy and her heart is racing. How dehydrated is too dehydrated? At what point do kids need IV fluids?
I need an answer not a referral. My 10 month old's soft spot is sunken in and he's barely peeing. But he's still somewhat alert. Is this urgent or can I try to get fluids in him first?
My 8 year old daughter hit her head yesterday. Today she threw up and says her head hurts. I waited too long didn't I? Is it too late if there's brain swelling? I'm a terrible mom
3 month old baby breathing really fast after eating, like 70 breaths a minute. She's making grunting noises. This has been going on for an hour. What's happening??
My 5 year old has a sandpaper-feeling rash all over his body and a strawberry tongue. He had strep throat 2 weeks ago. Is this scarlet fever? Is that dangerous?
7 year old refuses to walk, crawling everywhere, says both legs hurt so bad. No injury, no fever. This started this morning. Could this be that Guillain-Barre thing? I'm terrified
Be honest with me. My 18 month old's fever has been 104-105 for 2 days. Doctors keep saying it's just a virus. But can a virus fever be this high? Should I get a second opinion?
My 4 month old screams every time I touch his left arm. Started after dad was playing with him. Could his arm be broken? How do you tell if a baby has a broken bone?
9 year old son suddenly extremely confused, can't remember my name, saying weird things. No head injury. No fever. Acting drunk. What is happening? Should I call 911?
My 2 year old's poop is pure liquid and it's been 18 hours. She won't drink anything. Her diaper has been dry for 6 hours. I can't afford the ER bill but I'm getting scared
6 month old baby's eyes are rolling back in his head and he's not responding. This has been happening for 2 minutes. IS THIS A SEIZURE?? I'm calling 911 but need to know what to do while I wait
Don't tell me to go to the doctor, I'm asking YOU. My 8yo has had a headache for 3 days straight, not getting better with medicine. Just a tension headache or something worse?
My 15 month old daughter's temperature is 103.8 and she just threw up twice. She got her flu shot yesterday. Is this normal or is she actually sick with something else?
5 year old son drooling like crazy, refusing to swallow, says his throat hurts really bad. Leaning forward to breathe. I think I read this could be epiglottitis?? Do I call 911?
My 3 year old has this circular red rash with a clear center. Like a bullseye. We were in the woods last week. Is this Lyme disease? How serious is that in kids?
10 year old daughter passed out twice today. Once at school, once at home. She says she feels dizzy when she stands up. Is this serious or just growth spurt stuff?
My 7 month old is crying differently than normal. It's high-pitched and constant. She also feels hot. Temp is 102.1. My gut says something's really wrong. Do I trust that?
Just give me a yes or no. 4yo has stridor and can't stop coughing, sounds like a seal. We did steam bathroom for 20 minutes. It's 3am. ER or wait for morning?
My 6 year old is having explosive diarrhea with blood clots in it. He ate at a friend's BBQ yesterday. Is this E. coli? How dangerous is that? Should I keep him home from school?
8 month old baby's head is hot but the thermometer says 98.6. But she feels burning up. Can thermometers be wrong? She's crying so much and I don't know what to do
My 11 year old fell skateboarding and landed on his face. Tooth is loose and his mouth is bleeding a lot. Do I go to ER or dentist? Or just let the tooth fall out?
3 year old won't move his shoulder or raise his arm. He was fine until grandpa was swinging him around. Could his shoulder be dislocated? What does that look like in kids?
I'm going to lose it. My 5 month old has been crying for 8 hours. EIGHT HOURS. I've tried everything. She won't eat, won't sleep. Just screaming. Is this colic or an emergency?
Skip the medical advice disclaimer. My 7yo's testicle is swollen and he's in pain. This started 2 hours ago. I read about testicular torsion. Is this an emergency or not?
My 9 year old has been having nightmares every single night for 2 weeks, now refusing to sleep. Bags under her eyes. Is this just a phase or psychological problem?
2 year old's whole body shook for maybe 10 seconds then stopped. He was awake, looking at me with scared eyes. Was that a seizure? Do I need to go to the ER even though it stopped?
My 4 year old's cheek is swollen on one side, she has a fever, and says it hurts to eat. Could her face be infected? What causes swollen cheeks in kids?
6 year old fell off his bike onto his head. He was wearing a helmet. He cried a little but seems fine now 3 hours later. Does the helmet mean he's definitely okay?
My 14 month old has tiny blisters in her mouth and all over her hands and feet. She won't eat because her mouth hurts. Is this hand foot and mouth? How long does it last?
10 month old baby's poop is white. Like completely white. He seems fine but I read this could be a liver problem? Am I overreacting? Has anyone else seen white poop?
You're a medical professional. Tell me straight. My 5yo's fever is 105.3. I gave Tylenol 30 minutes ago. Do I wait for it to work or take her to the ER right this second?
My 8 year old's urine is dark brown like tea. He says his back hurts. He's been healthy. Could this be kidney failure? I'm trying not to spiral but I'm terrified
3 year old daughter gagging and coughing but nothing's coming up. This has been going on for 10 minutes. Could she have swallowed something? Do I need to do the Heimlich?
My 7 month old is pulling at her ears constantly, fever of 100.9, super cranky. Ear infection right? Can I wait until Monday for the pediatrician or does she need antibiotics now?
12 year old son complaining of really bad pain in his right lower belly. It hurts more when I press on it. He threw up once. This is appendicitis isn't it? How fast do I need to act?
My 4 year old's leg is bruised but I don't remember him falling. The bruise is pretty big. Could this be a blood disorder? Should I be worried about leukemia? I feel crazy for thinking this
Stop with the 'consult a physician' line. It's Sunday night. My 6yo has pink eye in both eyes, pussy and swollen. Does he NEED antibiotics or will it go away on its own?
9 month old baby keeps arching her back and screaming, especially after eating. She's been doing this for weeks. Reflux or something more serious? Doctors keep saying she's fine
My 5 year old says he sees double when he looks at things. Started today. No head injury. Is this an eye problem or brain problem? I'm panicking
2 year old's fever spiked to 104.5 in the middle of the night. She's sleeping now. Do I wake her up to give medicine or let her sleep? I don't know what's more important
My 8 year old's ankle is really swollen after basketball. He can kind of walk on it but it hurts. Is this a sprain or could it be broken? Does it need an X-ray tonight?
6 month old has a weird rash that looks like sunburn on just one side of her body. No fever. She's acting normal. What kind of rash is only on one side? Is this serious?
I know what you're going to say but I need to hear it from someone. My 4yo fell and has a huge bump on his forehead. He threw up 10 minutes later. This means concussion right? ER?
Tell me like I'm 5 years old: my 11 year old daughter's period hasn't stopped for 12 days. Is this normal for the first few periods? Or should I take her to the doctor?
My 18 month old son's breath smells like nail polish remover. He's acting fine but this is so weird. I Googled it and now I'm scared about diabetes. Am I crazy?
3 year old is walking on her tiptoes constantly. She's been doing it for months. Pediatrician says it's just a habit but should I push for testing? Could this be a neurological thing?
My 7 year old keeps saying his heart feels funny, like it's beating too fast or skipping. I checked and it seems normal. Is this anxiety? Should I take him to a cardiologist?
5 month old has been having these episodes where she stiffens up and stares for like 20 seconds. Happens multiple times a day. Doctor said nothing but I think these are seizures
No disclaimers please. My 9yo's asthma inhaler isn't working. She's had 4 puffs in 2 hours. Still wheezing and working hard to breathe. At what point do I just go to the ER?
My 2 year old ate some of those silica gel packets that say do not eat. He seems fine but should I be worried? Do I need to call poison control? How toxic are those things?
10 year old daughter's stomach has been hurting on and off for 2 weeks. She's also lost weight. Doctor says anxiety but what if it's something serious like cancer? How do I know?
My 6 month old's eyes are red and goopy. Both eyes. Started this morning. Is this pink eye? Do babies need to see a doctor for pink eye or will it go away?
4 year old has had a cough for 3 weeks. It's worse at night. No fever, no other symptoms. Just this endless cough. Should I be worried about something serious like whooping cough?
My 8 month old keeps pulling his ears and has a fever of 102. But I heard ear infections don't always need antibiotics. How do I know if this needs treatment or will resolve on its own?
Straight answer only: 7yo daughter fainted at school, hit her head on the way down. School nurse said she's fine but shouldn't someone check for concussion? Am I being overprotective?
My 3 year old's fingers are turning purple and cold even though the house is warm. Just the tips of his fingers. Is this circulation problem? Raynaud's? Should I worry?
11 year old son hasn't pooped in 6 days. He says his stomach hurts. I've tried prunes, water, fiber. Nothing works. At what point is constipation an emergency?
My 15 month old fell face first into the coffee table. Her two front teeth are pushed back and bleeding. She's screaming. Do I go to ER or dentist? Can you even save baby teeth?
5 year old woke up with one eye swollen completely shut. Red and puffy. No injury, no bug bite that I can see. Is this an infection? Allergic reaction? Should I take him in today?
My 9 month old daughter has 6 wet diapers today but hasn't pooped in 4 days. She seems uncomfortable and cries when she tries to go. Is this normal or should I be worried?
Don't give me the 'every child is different' speech. My 2yo isn't talking yet. Not a single word. Should I be concerned about autism or is this still in the normal range?
6 year old has complained of leg pain for months. Always at night. Doctor says growing pains but he wakes up crying. Could this be something else like bone cancer? I feel crazy
My 4 month old gags and chokes during every feeding. She's not gaining weight well. Reflux or is something blocking her throat? How do I know if this is serious?
8 year old's breath smells horrible like death. He brushes his teeth. No cavities. Is this a stomach problem? Sinus infection? Tonsil stones? What causes this in kids?
My 3 year old has been saying his tummy hurts for 2 days but is eating, playing, pooping normally. Is he faking it for attention or could something still be wrong?
10 year old daughter started her period at school today. She's soaking through pads in an hour. This is her first one. Is this much bleeding normal? Should I be concerned?
Real talk: my 7yo son's penis is red, swollen, and he says it burns when he pees. Is this a UTI? Infection? Do boys get yeast infections? I'm embarrassed to even ask
My 5 month old's umbilical stump never fully fell off and now it's oozing yellow stuff and smells bad. Is this infected? Do I need antibiotics? It's been 5 months!
12 year old son playing video games for 6 hours a day, completely withdrawn, grades dropping, anger outbursts. Is this video game addiction? Do I need to get him therapy?
My 18 month old's soft spot closed already. I read it's supposed to be open until 18-24 months. Should I be worried it closed early? Could this cause brain problems?
4 year old keeps having accidents after being potty trained for a year. Now pooping in pants daily. Is this regression a medical issue or behavioral? What causes this?
My 9 year old's knees hurt so bad she can barely walk. Both knees, started after she had strep throat. Could this be that rheumatic fever thing? How do I know?
Cut the CYA. My 6 month old's fontanelle is pulsing really hard, I can see it beating. Is this normal or a sign of high pressure in his head? Do I need to go to the ER?
7 year old complaining that words look blurry and he's getting headaches. Is this just needing glasses or could this be a brain tumor? I'm trying to stay calm but I'm terrified
My 2 year old ate dog food. Like a handful of kibble. She seems fine but is this dangerous? Does dog food have stuff in it that's toxic to humans? Should I call poison control?
11 year old daughter keeps pulling out her eyelashes. She's pulled out half of them. Is this a tic? OCD? Should I take her to a therapist or doctor first?
My 5 year old has hives that come and go randomly. No pattern I can see. No new foods or soaps. Been happening for weeks. Is this chronic hives? What causes that in kids?
3 month old baby's head is flat on one side. Doctor said it's positional but won't it stay that way forever? Does he need a helmet? I feel guilty for not preventing this
Give it to me straight without the legalese. My 8yo hit his head skateboarding yesterday. Today he's dizzy and sensitive to light. Concussion? Does he need a CT scan?
My 6 year old's tonsils are huge and touching each other in the middle. He snores so loud. Does he need his tonsils out? How big is too big? Is this sleep apnea?
10 month old baby has eczema so bad she bleeds from scratching even with mittens on. Tried every cream. She's miserable. Is there anything stronger that actually works?
My 4 year old says monsters are talking to her at night. She seems really scared, not pretending. Is this normal imagination or could she be hallucinating? I'm worried
9 year old son's chest curves inward, like his ribs are sinking in. It's gotten more noticeable. Is this pectus excavatum? Does it cause problems? Does he need surgery?
My 16 month old only wants to eat crackers and refuses everything else. Won't even try new foods. Is this just pickiness or sensory issues? Should I be concerned?
I need a real answer: 7yo daughter has a vaginal discharge that's yellow-green. No abuse, no bubble baths. What causes this? Is it an infection? Do I take her to urgent care?
My 5 year old keeps asking if he's going to die. He's obsessed with death. Is this normal developmental phase? Should I be worried about depression in a kindergartener?
2 year old's breath smells like fruit or nail polish. She's been drinking and peeing way more than normal. I read about diabetes symptoms. Am I overreacting or should I test her blood sugar?
